css: .cover-portfolio-karte-section { position: relative; min-height: 80vh; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 4rem 2rem; } .background-image-wrapper { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: -2; } .background-image-wrapper img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .overlay { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1); z-index: -1; } .portfolio-card { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.9); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border-radius: 1.5rem; padding: 3rem; text-align: center; max-width: 500px; width: 90%; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .portfolio-card > p { margin-bottom: 2rem; opacity: 0.8; } .author-info { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; } .author-info img { width: 60px; height: 60px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; } .author-details h4 { font-weight: 600; } .author-details p { font-size: 0.9rem; margin: 0; }
